document.name: User Administration Form

functionality.item: Collect user information via a form for further processing.
Use AJAX methods to allow for any action on a user (create, modify, search or delete).

document.assumptions: This page is served by a Web server and is URL addressable.
document.preconditions: Requests for modification or deletion require that a user already exists.
document.postconditions: A new user may be created upon creation request.
